name: Air Fryer Fried Rice
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: No need to stand over a hot wok when your air fryer can do the work for you. Cleanup is also a breeze.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup frozen peas and carrots, thawed
directions: Preheat a 5-quart air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
Whisk soy sauce and Sriracha together in a small bowl and set aside
Combine rice, sesame oil, water, vegetable oil, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Transfer mixture to a 7-inch round metal cake pan or air fryer insert
Place pan into the air fryer basket
Air fry for 10 minutes, stirring halfway through cook time
Pour egg over rice mixture and cook until egg is set, about 4 minutes
Stir in peas and carrots, breaking up the egg
Divide between serving bowls and pour reserved sauce over the top
